titleStmt.title: A perswasive (sic) to peace and unity a sermon preached before the Lord-Mayor and the aldermen of the city of London ; at the Church of St. Mary le-bow, on Sunday, January 16th 1697/8 / by Samuel Bradford.
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
